مقابلة مع يوسف نادر نادر
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education--Palestine--20th century
Labor--Palestine--History--20th century
Palestine--History--British Mandate, 1922-1948
oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSubject: al-Baṣṣah (Palestine); Alcoholic beverages; British Army; Brothers; Chamoun, Camille, 1900-1987; Competitiveness; Construction workers; Currencies; Dwellings; Education; Family structure; Income; Jews; Landowners; Means of transportation; Mothers; Professions; Public schools; Quarries and quarrying; Technicians; Water resources; Work; al-Sumayrīyah (Palestine); al-Zīb (Palestine); British Army; Employment; Fishing; Glubb, John Bagot, Sir, 1897-1986; Income; Jordanian Army; Living conditions; Professions; Technicians; Tools; Tyre (Lebanon); Vehicles; Weapons; Work
oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSF: al-Khaḍrā, Fawzī (School principal); Jarrār, ‘Abd al-Hādī (Teacher); Mazzāwī, Jamīl (Teacher); Salāmah, Ḥannā (Broker); Rustum, Ṭānyus (Jordanian Army officer); Ḥaddād, Tawfīq (Technician).

oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on April 3, 1998 with Yūsuf Nādir Nādir, male, born in 1924 in al-Baṣṣah, Palestine and resides in Tyre, Lebanon. He worked as a technician with the British Army forces.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع يوسف نادر نادر في 3 نيسان أبريل عام 1998، ذكر، ولد عام 1924 في البصّة، فلسطين ويقيم في صور، لبنان. كان فنيّا في قوات الجيش البريطاني.
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Childhood, education and work before Nakba. (@ 0:00)
oai_dc:dc.dc:tocAR: الطفولة والتربية والتعليم والعمل قبل النكبة. (@ 0:00)
